name: anonymousMiddleware
desc: Registers an anonymous middleware with the MiddlewareService.

name: ClientSession
desc: Represents a client session with a unique session ID and socket connection.

name: ClientSession
desc: Constructs a ClientSession with a given socket.

name: close
desc: Closes the socket connection to the client.

name: send
desc: Sends a message to the client through the socket.

name: sessionId
desc: The unique session ID for this client session.

name: socketMessageService
desc: The service for handling messages sent to and received from the client.

name: start
desc: Starts listening for data on the socket and handles incoming messages.

name: ClientSessions
desc: Manages the collection of active client sessions.

name: ClientSessions
desc: Factory constructor to get the singleton instance of ClientSessions.

name: addSession
desc: Adds a ClientSession to the collection.

name: getClientSessions
desc: Retrieves all active client sessions.

name: removeSession
desc: Removes a ClientSession from the collection based on its session ID.

name: sessionById
desc: Finds a ClientSession by its session ID.

name: getSession
desc: Retrieves a client session by its ID.

name: sendBySessionId
desc: Sends a message to a client session identified by its session ID.

name: Portal
desc: A decorator for classes that act as portals in the application.

name: Portal
desc: Constructs a Portal instance with the given path.

name: Portal.fromInstance
desc: Factory method to create a Portal instance based on a portal implementation.

name: path
desc: The URL path associated with this portal.

name: RequestHandler
desc: A decorator for methods that handle specific types of requests.

name: RequestHandler
desc: Constructs a RequestHandler instance with the given path.

name: RequestType
desc: An abstract class representing a type of request that can be handled by the application.

name: RequestType
desc: Constructs a RequestType instance with the given path.

name: path
desc: The URL path associated with this request type.

name: ResponseHandler
desc: A decorator for methods that handle responses to specific types of requests.

name: ResponseHandler
desc: Constructs a ResponseHandler instance with the given path.

name: PortalService
desc: Factory constructor for creating or retrieving a singleton instance of PortalService.

name: callMethodFromMap
desc: Invokes a method on a portal using a map as the argument.

name: portalByFullPath
desc: Retrieves a portal instance based on the full path of a request.

name: getPortal
desc: Retrieves a portal instance based on its path.

name: methodMirrorByFullPath
desc: Finds an annotated method within a portal based on the full request path.

name: methodPath
desc: Extracts the method path from the full path of a request.

name: registerPortal
desc: Registers a portal with the service.

name: Interceptor
desc: A class representing a middleware component.

name: Interceptor
desc: Constructs a Interceptor instance.

name: path
desc: The path on which the middleware is applied.

name: postHandle
desc: An optional post-handle callback.

name: preHandle
desc: An optional pre-handle callback.

name: register
desc: Registers the middleware with the MiddlewareService.

name: PostHandle
desc: Callback type for handling post-middleware actions.

name: PreHandle
desc: Callback type for handling pre-middleware actions.

name: MiddlewareService
desc: A service for managing middleware in the application.

name: MiddlewareService
desc: Factory constructor to provide a singleton instance.

name: middlewares
desc: A list to hold all registered middlewares.

name: postHandle
desc: Executes the post-handle phase of middlewares for a given path.

name: preHandle
desc: Executes the pre-handle phase of middlewares for a given path.

name: registerMiddleware
desc: Registers a middleware to be used by the service.

name: removeMiddleware
desc: Removes a middleware from the service.

name: SerializableModel
desc: An abstract class that provides a foundation for models that can be serialized into JSON.

name: SerializableModel
desc: Constructs a SerializableModel instance.

name: toJson
desc: Converts the model instance into a JSON string.

name: ServerMessageService
desc: Provides server-side message handling services for the Portal application.

name: handleRequest
desc: Handles incoming request messages from clients.

name: handleResponse
desc: Handles incoming response messages from clients.

name: send
desc: Sends a serialized model to the client.

name: userSession
desc: The user session associated with this service instance.

name: SocketMessage
desc: An abstract class representing a generic socket message.

name: SocketMessage
desc: Constructs a SocketMessage instance with the given path, content, and type.

name: content
desc: The content of the socket message.

name: path
desc: The path associated with the socket message.

name: toMap
desc: Serializes the socket message to a map.

name: type
desc: The type of the socket message.

name: SocketMessageType
desc: Enum representing the types of socket messages.

name: values
desc: A constant List of the values in this enum, in order of their declaration.

name: SocketRequest
desc: Represents a request sent over a socket connection.

name: SocketResponse
desc: Represents a response sent over a socket connection.

name: PortalClient
desc: A client for managing connections and communications with a Portal server.

name: PortalClient
desc: Factory constructor to access the singleton instance.

name: connect
desc: Connects to the Portal server and starts listening for messages.

name: disconnect
desc: Disconnects from the server.

name: listen
desc: Starts listening for messages from the server.

name: receive
desc: Handles receiving messages from the server.

name: send
desc: Sends a message to the server.

name: send
desc: Sends a message to the server using the PortalClient instance.

name: portalClient
desc: Provides a global access point to the PortalClient instance.

name: PortalServer
desc: Represents the server in the Portal application.

name: PortalServer
desc: Factory constructor for PortalServer.

name: host
desc: The host address the server listens on.

name: init
desc: Initializes the server asynchronously.

name: listen
desc: Starts listening for incoming connections.

name: port
desc: The port number the server listens on.

name: portalServer
desc: Provides a global accessor for the PortalServer singleton.
